channel.title: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (N. Virginia) Service Status
Current service status feed for Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (N. Virginia).
channel.generator: AWS Service Health Dashboard RSS Generator

item.title: Service is operating normally: Degraded performance for some EBS Volumes
item.description: Between 3:57 PM PST and 4:02 PM PST a small number of EBS volumes in a single AZ in the US-EAST-1 region experienced degraded performance. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

item.title: Informational message: Investigating degraded performance of EBS volumes
item.description: We are investigating degraded performance for a small number of EBS volumes in a single AZ in the US-EAST-1 region.
